entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND WINDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, INCREASING TO 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SHOWERS, WINDY WITH LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S

data.HIGHS: SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
